DOC.brief_summary: This is a 3-week trial in normal healthy or lipid clinic patients studying a novel approach to treating dyslipidemia.
DOC.brief_title: An Investigational Drug Study Evaluating a Novel Approach to Treat Dyslipidemia (0524A-032)
DOC.detailed_description: The duration of treatment is 7 days.
DOC.criteria: Males and females (ages 2575) A condition which, in the opinion of the investigator, might pose a risk to the patient or interfere with participating in the study
